sections.paragraph: + A Merarite, and ancestor of Ethan the singer. (1 Chronicles 6:44) (B.C. before 1015.) + The father of Kish, a Merarite, in the reign of Hezekiah. (2 Chronicles 29:12) (B.C. before 736.) + One of the Bene-Elam in the time of Ezra, who had married a foreign wife. (Ezra 10:26) (B.C. 659.)
